item.title: What Does a Million Dollar Apartment in NYC Look Like?
item.description:
What Does a Million Dollar Apartment in NYC Look Like?

To many of us, a million dollar home sounds like it should be the lap of luxury: marble tubs, game room, wine cellar, perhaps a private pool. But, a million dollars doesn't go quite as far down amenities lane in New York City. So what does a million bucks buy you in Gotham?

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.
